questions.title: 为了解决这个问题，他们同意妥协。
questions.answer: For the sake of settling the matter they agreed to compromise.

questions.title: 共产党为人民的利益而奋斗。
questions.answer: The Communist Party fights for the benefit of the interests of thepeople.

questions.title: 这笔钱是用来为孤寡老人谋福利的。
questions.answer: The money is to be used for the benefit of the elderly people of nofamily.

questions.title: 当今社会，父母辛苦工作是为后代着想。
questions.answer: In our world today, parents work hard for the sake of future generations.

questions.title: 汤姆飞去澳大利亚为了送给他女朋友一个生日礼物。
questions.answer: Tom flied to Australia for the purpose of giving his girlfriend abirthday present.

answer.en: We made concessions for the sake of peace.

title: ——他太瘦了，为什么他每天只吃水果和蔬菜？
——他吃素是为了他的身体健康。

answer.en: He is too thin, why does he only eat fruits and vegetables every day?
He takes only vegetarian food for the good of his health.

title: ——你公司的宗旨是什么？
——我开公司的宗旨是服务大众。

answer.en: I open this company for the purpose of serving the public.
